#include "mbed.h"

Timeout flipper;
DigitalOut led1(LED1);
DigitalOut led2(LED2);

void flip()
{
   //PROGRAM IN INTERRUPT
}

int main() {

    flipper.attach(&flip, 2.0); //setup flipper to call flip after 2sec

    // spin in a main loop. flipper will interrupt it to call flip
    while(1) {
        led1 = !led1;
        wait(0.2);
    }
}
